title: Hi, I'm Kauanny Alencar
about_bio: I’m a self-taught Frontend Developer who loves learning about the world. I’m currently studying React,  and strengthening my knowledge in responsiveness, UI best practices, and API integration, aiming to become a Full Stack Developer. I also integrate AI tools into my learning and creation process, using them as support to grow faster.
contact_text: I'm open to opportunities, collaborations, and new challenges. Feel free to reach out!
